thread.title: How tech can disrupt the democratic process

title: How tech can disrupt the democratic process
text:
How tech can disrupt the democratic process 10:41am GMT - 02:41 
Citizens can use technology, like mobile phones, to engage with politicians beyond the ballot box and hold government leaders on every scale accountable, says Govio founder Christian Mandl.   
Citizens can use technology, like mobile phones, to engage with politicians beyond the ballot box and hold government leaders on every scale accountable, says Govio founder Christian Mandl.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/01/25/how-tech-can-disrupt-the-democratic-proc?videoId=388592263&videoChannel=13422
